verses.verse: וְזֶ֨ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh now this הַדָּבָ֜ר <WH1697> had-da-Var And this [is] the thing אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- you תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh that thou shalt do לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem לְקַדֵּ֥שׁ <WH6942> le-kad-Desh unto them to hallow אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam לְכַהֵ֣ן <WH3547> le-cha-Hen them to minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י Li; לְ֠קַח <WH3947> Le-kach Take פַּ֣ר <WH6499> par bullock אֶחָ֧ד <WH259> 'e-Chad one בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- young בָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> ba-Kar bull וְאֵילִ֥ם <WH352> ve-'ei-Lim rams שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim and two תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> te-mi-Mim. without blemish

וְלֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> ve-Le-chem bread מַצּ֗וֹת <WH4682> matz-Tzot, And unleavened וְחַלֹּ֤ת <WH2471> ve-chal-Lot and cakes מַצֹּת֙ <WH4682> matz-Tzot unleavened בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <WH1101> be-lu-Lot tempered בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> bash-She-men, with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <WH7550> u-re-ki-Kei and wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> matz-Tzot unleavened מְשֻׁחִ֣ים <WH4886> me-shu-Chim anointed בַּשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> bash-Sha-men; with oil סֹ֥לֶת <WH5560> So-let flour חִטִּ֖ים <WH2406> chit-Tim [of] wheaten תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> 'o-Tam.

וְנָתַתָּ֤ <WH5414> ve-na-ta-Ta And thou shalt put אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> o-Tam עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and סַ֣ל <WH5536> sal basket אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, them into one וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֥ <WH7126> ve-hik-rav-Ta and bring אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam בַּסָּ֑ל <WH5536> bas-Sal; them in the basket וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH854> ve-'Et with הַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> hap-Par, with the bullock וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> she-Nei and the two הָאֵילִֽם׃ <WH352> ha-'ei-Lim. rams

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron And Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָיו֙ <WH1121> ba-Nav and his sons תַּקְרִ֔יב <WH7126> tak-Riv, thou shalt bring אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְרָחַצְתָּ֥ <WH7364> ve-ra-chatz-Ta and shalt wash אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> bam-Ma-yim. them with water

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta And thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבְּגָדִ֗ים <WH899> hab-be-ga-Dim, the garments וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֤ <WH3847> ve-hil-bash-Ta and put אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron upon Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכֻּתֹּ֔נֶת <WH3801> hak-kut-To-net, the coat וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et מְעִ֣יל <WH4598> me-'Il and the robe הָאֵפֹ֔ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod, of the ephod וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod and the ephod וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen; and the breastplate וְאָפַדְתָּ֣ <WH640> ve-'a-fad-Ta and gird ל֔וֹ lo, בְּחֵ֖שֶׁב <WH2805> be-Che-shev him with the curious girdle הָאֵפֹֽד׃ <WH646> ha-'e-Fod. of the ephod

וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <WH7760> ve-sam-Ta And thou shalt put הַמִּצְנֶ֖פֶת <WH4701> ham-mitz-Ne-fet the mitre עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> ro-Sho; upon his head וְנָתַתָּ֛ <WH5414> ve-na-ta-Ta and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נֵ֥זֶר <WH5145> Ne-zer crown הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh the holy עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַמִּצְנָֽפֶת׃ <WH4701> ham-mitz-Na-fet. upon the mitre

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta Then shalt thou take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> ham-mish-Chah, the anointing וְיָצַקְתָּ֖ <WH3332> ve-ya-tzak-Ta and pour עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> ro-Sho; [it] upon his head וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֖ <WH4886> u-ma-shach-Ta and anoint אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To.
וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> ba-Nav his sons תַּקְרִ֑יב <WH7126> tak-Riv; And thou shalt bring וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֖ם <WH3847> ve-hil-bash-Tam and put כֻּתֳּנֹֽת׃ <WH3801> kut-to-Not. coats

וְחָגַרְתָּ֩ <WH2296> ve-cha-gar-Ta And thou shalt gird אֹתָ֨ם <WH853> 'o-Tam אַבְנֵ֜ט <WH73> 'av-Net them with girdles אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וּבָנָ֗יו <WH1121> u-va-Nav, and his sons וְחָבַשְׁתָּ֤ <WH2280> ve-cha-vash-Ta and put לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> la-Hem like מִגְבָּעֹ֔ת <WH4021> mig-ba-'Ot, the bonnets וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-ye-Tah shall have לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> la-Hem like כְּהֻנָּ֖ה <WH3550> ke-hun-Nah on them and the priest's office לְחֻקַּ֣ת <WH2708> le-chuk-Kat statute עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> o-Lam; shall be theirs for a perpetual וּמִלֵּאתָ֥ <WH4390> u-mil-le-Ta accomplish יַֽד־ <WH3027> yad- able אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וְיַד־ <WH3027> ve-yad- able בָּנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> ba-Nav. and his sons

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֙ <WH7126> ve-hik-rav-Ta to be brought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> hap-Par, And thou shalt cause a bullock לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְסָמַ֨ךְ <WH5564> ve-sa-Mach shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> u-va-Nav and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem their hands עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> rosh upon the head הַפָּֽר׃ <WH6499> hap-Par. of the bullock

וְשָׁחַטְתָּ֥ <WH7819> ve-sha-chat-Ta And thou shalt kill אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַפָּ֖ר <WH6499> hap-Par the bullock לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach [by] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta And thou shalt take מִדַּ֣ם <WH1818> mid-Dam of the blood הַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> hap-Par, of the bullock וְנָתַתָּ֛ה <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Tah and put עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on קַרְנֹ֥ת <WH7161> kar-Not [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach of the altar בְּאֶצְבָּעֶ֑ךָ <WH676> be-'etz-ba-'E-cha; with thy finger וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַדָּ֣ם <WH1818> had-Dam all the blood תִּשְׁפֹּ֔ךְ <WH8210> tish-Poch, and pour אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- beside יְס֖וֹד <WH3247> ye-Sod the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach. of the altar

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֗ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta, And thou shalt take אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַחֵלֶב֮ <WH2459> ha-che-Lev all the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> ham-chas-Seh that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַקֶּרֶב֒ <WH7130> hak-ke-Rev the inwards וְאֵ֗ת <WH853> ve-'Et, הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3508> hai-yo-Te-ret and the caul עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> hak-ka-Ved, [that is] above the liver וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei and the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <WH3629> hak-ke-la-Yot, kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> ha-Che-lev and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that עֲלֵיהֶ֑ן <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hen; is on וְהִקְטַרְתָּ֖ <WH6999> ve-hik-tar-Ta that [is] upon them and burn הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-chah. [them] upon the altar

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּשַׂ֤ר <WH1320> be-Sar But the flesh הַפָּר֙ <WH6499> hap-Par of the bullock וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עֹר֣וֹ <WH5785> o-Ro and his skin וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et פִּרְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6569> pir-Sho, and his dung תִּשְׂרֹ֣ף <WH8313> tis-Rof shalt thou burn בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh, with fire מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> mi-Chutz without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> lam-ma-cha-Neh; the camp חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> chat-Tat it [is] a sin offering הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאַ֥יִל <WH352> ha-'A-yil ram הָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad one תִּקָּ֑ח <WH3947> tik-Kach; Thou shalt also take וְסָ֨מְכ֜וּ <WH5564> ve-Sa-me-Chu shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> u-va-Nav and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem their hands עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> rosh upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <WH352> ha-'A-yil. of the ram

וְשָׁחַטְתָּ֖ <WH7819> ve-sha-chat-Ta And thou shalt slay אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֑יִל <WH352> ha-'A-yil; the ram וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta and thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דָּמ֔וֹ <WH1818> da-Mo, his blood וְזָרַקְתָּ֥ <WH2236> ve-za-rak-Ta and sprinkle עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. [it] round about

וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאַ֔יִל <WH352> ha-'A-yil, the ram תְּנַתֵּ֖חַ <WH5408> te-nat-Te-ach And thou shalt cut לִנְתָחָ֑יו <WH5409> lin-ta-Chav; in pieces וְרָחַצְתָּ֤ <WH7364> ve-ra-chatz-Ta and wash קִרְבּוֹ֙ <WH7130> kir-Bo the inwards וּכְרָעָ֔יו <WH3767> u-che-ra-'Av, of him and his legs וְנָתַתָּ֥ <WH5414> ve-na-ta-Ta and put עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and נְתָחָ֖יו <WH5409> ne-ta-Chav [them] unto his pieces וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and its רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> ro-Sho. and unto his head

וְהִקְטַרְתָּ֤ <WH6999> ve-hik-tar-Ta And thou shalt burn אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- the whole הָאַ֙יִל֙ <WH352> ha-'A-yil the whole ram הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-chah, upon the altar עֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> 'o-Lah it [is] a burnt offering ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD רֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> Rei-ach savour נִיח֔וֹחַ <WH5207> ni-Cho-ach, it [is] a sweet אִשֶּׁ֥ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. you

וְלָ֣קַחְתָּ֔ <WH3947> ve-La-kach-ta, And thou shalt take אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et הָאַ֣יִל <WH352> ha-'A-yil ram הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni; the other וְסָמַ֨ךְ <WH5564> ve-sa-Mach shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> u-va-Nav and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem their hands עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> rosh upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <WH352> ha-'A-yil. of the ram
